trans-unit.source: Specifies the actions that occur with <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> author, anchor, and cargo resources.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as ações que ocorrem com autor, a âncora e os recursos de carga do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction> defines the operations that occur to an annotation's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction> Define as operações que ocorrem em uma anotação <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The component was added to the annotation.
trans-unit.target: O componente foi adicionado à anotação.

trans-unit.source: The component was modified within the annotation.
trans-unit.target: O componente foi modificado na anotação.

trans-unit.source: The component was removed from the annotation.
trans-unit.target: O componente foi removido da anotação.
